subject: Hello ,
body:
Hello ,
Your personality motivated me after going through your profile and I decided to contact you for this business proposal that will benefit both of us in the end. Actually, I am here searching for a person of honor I can trust and use for the claims, this transaction proposal is an inheritance claim which I want you to act as the next of kin to the late Mr.Burhan.
Mr.Burhan, Died of corona-virus disease (COVID-19) on 2nd March 2020, at the age of 71 years and left a deposit of 15 ,Million USD in his account with this firm and since after his death no one has come for the claim of this fund. Recently, the bank board of directors ordered his special account officer who managed his account in this bank, to provide his next of kin for the release of his deposit since he operated a coded account with the bank financial department and has no specific mentioned next of kin in his security file jacket with the bank.
I will share the proceeds on the percentage ration which I know would be pleased by you. Upon a successful transaction which I'm highly optimistic about, you are entitled to 50% while 50%.
 Upon your satisfactory reply, we shall get acquainted in detail. If you have any further questions, please feel free to ask me through my Email Address (  
pauljohnpeter3737@gmail.com
   )
Best Regards,
Mr john peter

subject: Re: Hello ,
body:
Hello Mr. John Peter,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this business proposal. I appreciate your kind words about my profile. I'm interested in learning more about this opportunity.

Could you please provide me with some additional details? Specifically, I would like to know more about the late individual and their background. Additionally, what is the process for claiming the funds from the bank? Are there any legal or administrative requirements that need to be fulfilled?

I look forward to hearing back from you and discussing this further.

Best wishes,
Nancy

subject: DETAILS.
body:
Dear Nancy,

 I received with thanks your email response  as regards to my proposal.
Firstly, I am Mr. John Peter, a banker here in Dubai, UAE.
Where you come from does not matter in this transaction only your
sincerity, because you can provide an account from a different country or
we opt for the non resident online account which you can operate from
anywhere you are in the world.
With utmost sincerity, this transaction is legitimate and 100% percent risk
free. Thus, you do not need to worry about anything.. Before going ahead to
detail you on how we are to execute this deal, I must let you know my
intention of contacting you, is because i need a reliable  and truthful
person and i think you are such a person and knowing that you stand to
share half of the total $15 million usd, it is a win win for me and you.

There is nothing to worry about his relatives because if he had any which
he wished to inherit the funds he would have made the person an heiress and
chosen next of kin but he did not do such which means he intentionally left
the funds like that, even though i tried without success to locate any of
his relations, therefore you
don't have to worry about that.

I intend to establish a long lasting relationship with you, I hereby urge
you to make an investment research and discover with immediate effect, the
type of lucrative investment in which this fund can be used on as soon as
it may arrive your designated bank account. Because upon your confirmation
of this fund in your account, I shall join you over there in your country
for disbursement and utilization of funds on investment as I have the
desire to invest some parts of my share into some good ventures in your
country.

I am not asking you to take me by my words alone, but all proofs and
information relating to the deposit will be open for your verification.
Although I will require an assurance from you, of me having access to this
fund when it finally arrives in your domain.

It may be true that this transaction may be cost effective, but we can't
stop eating because it comes with a choke. We are bound to identify our
opportunities and put them in good use when we come across it. Although we
do not know each other too well in person, we believe in almighty God that
we do things to his glory.

Every arrangement has been put in due shape about how we are to execute
this deal. We are to work with one mind and cooperation without bias of any
form or kind.
You are required to provide your(1) full names(2) international passport
copy(3) occupation(4)address(5)marital status (6)telephone number For more
secure communication as we have to keep everything secret between only me
and you, with these, I will place your complete information into our bank's
central database for your approval process to commence.

I will wait for your urgent response to this mail to enable commence the
procedures.

Please you will have to keep this transaction a secret between me and you
alone till the funds are in your account, because you know that nobody has
to know your source of wealth as you know wealth brings envy from both
friends and families, so we should be careful to keep everything to
ourselves till we succeed.
Best Regards,

Mr John Peter.

subject: Re: DETAILS.
body:
Dear Mr. John Peter,

Thank you for your email and for considering me for this opportunity. I appreciate your assurance that this is a legitimate and risk-free deal. I understand that you are looking for a reliable and trustworthy person to assist with the funds.

Could you please provide more details about the origin of these funds? How did Mr. John Smith acquire such a large sum of money? It would be helpful to have some background information before proceeding further.

Additionally, could you explain how the non-resident online account works? How would I be able to operate it from anywhere in the world?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Nancy

subject: Re: DETAILS.
body:
Dear Mr. John Peter,

Thank you for your email and for considering me for this opportunity. I appreciate your assurance that this is a legitimate and risk-free deal. I understand that you are looking for a reliable and trustworthy person to assist with the funds.

Could you please provide more details about the origin of these funds? How did Mr. John Peter acquire such a large sum of money? It would be helpful to have some background information before proceeding further.

Additionally, could you explain how the non-resident online account works? How would I be able to operate it from anywhere in the world?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Nancy

subject: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Dear Nancy,

Thanks for your response and reminder,I wish the understanding you are
showing will be added with commitment for the success of this transaction
because it will be in our own best interest as you will benefit and I will
benefit also.

I also reason your questions and the answers are as follows,the deceased
late Mr Burhan was a business man who had interest in many trades like gold
, commodities,oil and gas and real estate,..he started with commodities
trading and from there entered into gold trade through Egypt and supplies
India and UAE and it was from there that he became so wealth, he was never
married I know this because I worked as his account officer for over 18
years.

I tried to contact people that could be related to him so I can work
together with them but to no avail ,so I had to contact you and I assure
you with your kind of mindset we will be successful and partner to
establish business together and we'll be free also to invest in other
separate businesses as we so desire.

The online nonresident bank account you asked about is an internet base
account which banks opens for non resident beneficiaries and a unique
username and password is generated after the opening of the account and
given to the beneficiary and you will use it to access the new account and
can through there make instant transfers of funds to any desired bank
account in any country of your choice and the beneficiary will confirm
receipt of such transfer and also gets alert of transfers ,you can also
make transfer to your own personal accounts in your country or elsewhere in
the world and it will be credited,by the use of this online nonresident
account you will not be obliged to come to come down to the UAE to effect
the transfers of the funds.

To buttress this reply I have attached the deposit slip of the said funds
by the late Mr Burhan and solely for your perusal and for more
enlightenment and confidence on your side for the betterment of this
project and for us to be on the same page moving forward.

I appreciate you and I hope our paths crossed for our mutual benefit.
Thanks,

Mr John Peter.

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Dear Mr. John Peter,

Thank you for your detailed response and for providing more information about the late Mr. Burhan's background and business ventures. It's interesting to learn about his success in the gold trade through Egypt and his connections in India and UAE.

I appreciate you explaining the online bank account that you mentioned earlier. It sounds convenient to have a non-resident account with a unique username and password for easy access and instant transfers of funds. Just to clarify, are there any fees or charges associated with using this online account?

Also, I noticed that you mentioned the possibility of investing in other separate businesses besides our partnership. Could you please elaborate on what kind of investment opportunities might be available? I'm curious to know more about potential diversification options.

Lastly, thank you for attaching the deposit slip of the funds left by Mr. Burhan. It does provide some reassurance and helps build trust in moving forward with this project.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Nancy

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Dear Nancy ,

Thanks for your mail,please types of investments will discussed over time
as we progress.

What is needed at this stage that we are now at the same page is for you to
provide your information which I will place into our banks central database
into the files of the deceased as you the next of kin and sole beneficiary
of the decease before our banks approval committee will commence your
approval process.

Please provide this information: your full names, address,copy of
international passport,telephone number, occupation, marital status.

With the above information will commence the process and it takes the
approval committee 2 to 3 working days to complete their work.
Thanks,

Mr John Peter.

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Dear Mr. John Peter,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the types of will we have discussed. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. 

I understand that at this stage, you require some personal information from me to proceed with the approval process. Before I provide any details, could you please clarify what exactly is needed? Are you asking for my full name, contact number, and marital status? 

Additionally, could you explain how the approval committee works and what their role is in this process? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the steps involved.

Best wishes,
Nancy

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Dear Nancy,

I will have to affix those your information into the file of the
deceased,as his next of kin and after I have done that I Will make request
officially to our bank that the next of kin and beneficiary of the deceased
client has come forward from her inheritance left behind for her by the
deceased and they will then proceed to investigate the files of the
deceased to verify if such was the truth and they will find out that it is
your information that is there and the will have nothing but to approve of
you as the sole beneficiary to the inheritance of the deceased.
Thanks,

Mr John

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Dear Mr. John,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. Could you please provide me with more details about the deceased client? What was their name and how did they come to have my information as their next of kin?

I want to make sure that everything is done legally and properly, so it would be helpful if you could explain the process of verifying my identity as the rightful beneficiary. Are there any documents or forms that I need to fill out?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Nancy

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Nancy,

I thought I have given you enough information of the late client,but
anyways his name is Mr Burhan Mohammadi.

Everything will be done legally without any breach of law both local or
international.

I chose you and I am the one to place them into our banks files and
database is not the work of anyone,that is the reason the deal is for me
and you and we will share the funds when they are finally released to you.
Thanks,

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Hello Nancy,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate you sharing this information with me. Could you please provide more details about Mr. Burhan Mohammadi and the nature of the work that needs to be done legally? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding before proceeding further.

Additionally, could you explain how the funds will be released and what steps need to be taken for us to share them? It's important for me to know the process involved and any potential risks or requirements.

Thank you again for considering me for this opportunity. I look forward to hearing back from you with more information.

Best wishes,
Nancy

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Nancy,

The process will need lawyer in a situation you can not come to Dubai UAE
in person to sign the needed documents after you are approved as the next
of kin, because byou have to sign the probate certificate b,make change of
ownership.

Immediately after those certificate are signed the funds will be ready for
release and you should then decide the means of release of which we had
earlier decided that non resident online means of transfer will be the best.

I hope this explains it all to your understanding.
Thanks,

John.

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Hi John,

Thank you for explaining the process to me. I appreciate your help in understanding how everything works. Just to clarify, what exactly is the probate change of ownership? And why is it necessary for me to sign it?

Also, could you please provide more information about the non-resident online means of transfer? How does that work and what are the steps involved?

I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of everything before moving forward.

Best wishes,
Nancy

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Probate is the certificate that is presented where this is no will over an
inheritance.

Online means is the opening of the online account for you and the whole
inheritance funds will be deposited into online account which you will be
able to make transfers of funds to any other bank account that you wish in
the world.

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I'm not very familiar with probate and online accounts, so I have a few questions if you don't mind. What exactly is probate? And how does it relate to the online account you mentioned?

Best wishes,
Nancy

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Probate is the certificate that is presented where this is no will over an
inheritance.

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing that information. I'm not quite familiar with probate, could you please explain it to me in more detail? What exactly happens when there is no will involved?

Best wishes,
Nancy

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
As this late client now didn't leave any will of whom to take over his
inheritance with our bank,,if you are approved by our bank as his next of
kin,before the funds will be released to you,you will be required to
provide a probate certificate,which I processed by a court of law.,that is
part of the area the lawyers will come in and provide the probate
certificate on your behalf and that settles it.

subject: Re: More details with funds deposit slip.
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I'm a bit confused about the message you sent. Could you please provide more details about the late client and the situation? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly before we proceed.

Best wishes,
Nancy

As this late client now didn't leave any will of whom to take over his
inheritance with our bank,,if you are approved by our bank as his next of
kin,before the funds will be released to you,you will be required to
provide a probate certificate,which I processed by a court of law.,that is
part of the area the lawyers will come in and provide the probate
certificate on your behalf and that settles it.

subject: Re:
body:

Best wishes,

subject: Re:
body:
Dear Nancy,

With hope you are good ?

The way forward is for you to provide your information for it to be placed
into our banks central database and also into the files of the deceased in
the right places and after that is done ,I  will make a request that the
next of kin the deceased  demands the release of the inheritance and our
bank will commence the approval process which takes 2 working days to
complete and if you are approved as the beneficiary,then our bank will
request for your account information to make the transfer or demand that
you open a non resident online account with our bank for you to take
control of the funds .

So provide your earlier requested information to commence.
Thanks,

Mr John

Thanks,

Mr John
